question: With reference to India's culture and tradition, what is "Kambala"?
option1: an annual buffalo race held traditionally in Karnataka
option2: a martial art practiced in Manipur
option4: an ancient style bronze and brasswork√Ç of Andhra Pradesh
answer: an annual buffalo race held traditionally in Karnataka
explanation: Kambala is an annual buffalo race held traditionally in Karnataka state of India. The event was recently in news, when after the ban on Jallikattu; the Animal Welfare Board of India (AWBI) has asked Karnataka government to ban the race citing reasons of cruelity to animals.
